name: event
description: A command for starting and managing events.

options.description: A command to create & start an event.

options.description: The name/theme of the event.

options.description: The type of the event.

options.description: The channel to post the event message in. If none is provided, the current channel is used.

options.name: length
options.description: The length of the event, in hours. If not provided, it'll default to 3 days.

options.description: The reward of the event.

options.description: The options of a poll event, if applicable. Example: 'Option 1; Option 2; Option 3'. Max 5 options.
